assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: T.A.C. Consumer Public Company Limited engages in procurement, production and distribution of beverage and lifestyle products in Thailand and internationally. The company provides Zenya, a ready-to-drink green tea mixed with fruit juices, minerals, and vitamins; and Na-Arun, a green tea milk. It also offers B2B Drink Dispenser, a dispenser drink; and All Café, an instant drink, as well as hot beverage vending machines. In addition, the company is involved in café business under the MuanChon, Jungle Café, Arabitia Café, and CP Fresh Mart names; and character business under the San-X, Dog Please, Jay The Rabbit, and Warbie Yama names. Further, it licenses its products in Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, Cambodia, Myanmar, Laos, and Vietnam. The company was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
